# Using A Custom Email Address

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/help-articles/email-marketing/using-a-custom-email-address/

## Category
10 Email Marketing

## Subcategory

## Article Content

HOME
CAMPAIGNS
USING A CUSTOM EMAIL ADDRESS
Using a Custom Email Address

You can send email campaigns and flow emails from the same custom email address. This can help increase brand awareness and help clients easily recognize your emails.

The articles in this section cover how to set up and use a custom email address.

Important: 

You will need access to your domain provider's DNS settings to complete this setup.

In this section:
Sending Emails from a Custom Email Address
Adding DNS Records to Bluehost
Adding DNS Records to GoDaddy
Adding DNS Records to Squarespace
Adding DNS Records to Wix
Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
